Detailed Description

A collection of functions which aren't really tied to any particular class in the compiler, but are used in a few places.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

CUtilFuncs::~CUtilFuncs ( void   )  [inline]

Member Function Documentation

template<typename T>
static T CUtilFuncs::GetLiteralValue ( CTreeNode *  LitNode  )  [inline, static]

Convert a literal tree node into a value of the correct type. It's the callers responsibility to provide the correct type as the template parameter T.

Parameters:
LitNode The literal node to extract the value from.
Returns:
Value stored inside the literal node.

string CUtilFuncs::TokenTypeToStr ( TokenType  Tok  )  [static]

Convert a token type to string.

Parameters:
Tok The token type to convert.
Returns:
A human understandable string describing the token.

TokenType CUtilFuncs::ConvertExprContextToTokenType ( ExprContext  Context  )  [static]

Helper function to convert an expression parsing context into a token type to terminate parsing the expression on.

Parameters:
Context The expression context to get the terminating token for.
Returns:
A token type to terminate parsing an expression on given the context passed in.

string CUtilFuncs::GenCompilerTempName ( void   )  [static]

Create a new name for a compiler generated temporary variable.

Returns:
A new name of the form "CompTemp.XX" where XX is a unique number.

string CUtilFuncs::GenNewLabel ( void   )  [static]

Create a new name for a label.

Returns:
The name of the new label of the form "LXX" where XX is a unique number.

string CUtilFuncs::HardRegisterToStr ( HardRegister  Reg  )  [static]

Convert a hard-register to it's equilavent name such as "eax" etc.

Parameters:
Reg The enumeration we'd like to get the name for.
Returns:
The hard registers name.

bool CUtilFuncs::ExprRefersToFloatingPointType ( CTreeNode *  Expr  )  [static]

Checks to see if the given expression efers to a floating point type.

Parameters:
Expr Expression/statement to check.
Returns:
True if a floating point type is used in Expr, false if it doesn't.

CTreeNode * CUtilFuncs::GetDeclFromNode ( CTreeNode *  Node  )  [static]

Helper function to get a decl from an arbritrary node, recurses down through the tree until we hit the root for that particular node type.

Parameters:
Node The node we want the _decl for.
Returns:
A _decl tree node for Node.
